description: Creative a festive centrepiece with this Christmas dessert sharing platter, overflowing with fruit mince tarts, rum balls, fudge and brandy custard.
name: Christmas Dessert Sharing Platter Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt Woolworths dreamy chocolate chip cookies

recipeInstructions.text: Line a baking tray with baking paper. Break chocolate into a microwave-safe bowl. Microwave on medium for 1 minute, stirring halfway through with a metal spoon, or until melted and smooth. Dip half of each strawberry into chocolate to coat. Place onto tray and set aside for 30 minutes or until set.

HowToTip.tipText: To serve your custard warm, stir in a saucepan over low heat for 3 minutes or until warmed through.

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon custard into a small bowl (see Tip). Arrange custard, tarts, cookies, strawberries, rum balls, fudge, raspberries and blueberries on a serving platter. Serve.
